name: A GHOST STORY FOR CHRISTMAS
description:
A GHOST STORY FOR CHRISTMAS is a text-based game made by Charlie Dart.

I was inspired by the short films of the same name aired on the BBC in the 70s, and the M. R. James stories on which many of these were based.

It is a game about ghosts, yes, but it's also about getting to know a character for whom things are not going to end well.

There are neurochips, cave paintings, Victorian diary entries and an INESCAPABLE NAMELESS HORROR.

I hope you all enjoy it!

Merry Christmas!
